reuters.title: MEDAR <MDXR> ACQUIRES OWENS-ILLINOIS <OI> UNIT
reuters.body: Medar Inc said it acquired Automatic Inspection Devices Inc, a subsidiary of Owens-Illinois Inc, Toledo, Ohio, through an exchange of stock for 80 pct of the company. Automatic Designs and manufactures a line of machine vision systems for the packaging, pharmaceutical, electronics and consumer goods industries. Reuter 
